alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:47AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perry, southwestern Conway, northeastern Yell and southeastern Pope Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1047 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ola, or 13 miles south of Russellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Ola... Adona... Carden Bottoms... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Aplin... Birta... Ada... Nimrod... Holla Bend... Sunlight Bay Park... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
